1.0.name: wordpress/jquery-accessible-progressbar
1.0.description: JQuery Accessible Progressbar with Radio buttons presents a progress-bar showing up when the button group controling the number of your blog's recent posts, recent comments and archives shown in an accordion is activated and uses the JQuery WAI-ARIA enabled progressbar, accordion and button.
